title: Premiere: Say Lou Lou – Beloved (TieDye Remix)
body:
Having recently completed a successful [show](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/24910-live-review-say-lou-lou-concrete-14th-nov/) at Concrete in London indie music it-girls, **Say Lou Lou**, are following up with a remix of their latest track, _Beloved_, by disco-duo **TieDye**. The fellow Swedes take Beloved to new levels by transforming the airy dream-pop track into club groove gold. Proving again and again that there’s not a genre these girls couldn’t dominate. Let the dancing commence….

“Beloved” is released worldwide on November 25th on Columbia / à Deux records

Pre-Order [here](http://www.smarturl.it/BITDdigi?IQid=sc)
